name: 芮祥鵬
objective:
高分子流變學
本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:
(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論
(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。

This rheology course includes (1) The fluid Mechanics (2)The viscoelastic theory (3) Time-temperature superposition (4) The glass transition point for amorphous polymer (5) Rubber theory (6) The Viscoelastic Modelling (7)Dielectric Relaxation during phase transition
